links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Sir Robert Stephens''' ([[14 July|July 14]], [[1931]] - [[12 November|November 12]], [[1995]])  voiced the part of [[Aragorn]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings 1981 radio series]] broadcasted on the BBC 4.

==Quotes==
{{quote|He was, for some, an unlikely choice; but for a great many listeners Robert's powerfully idiosyncratic performance embodied a strong sense of Aragorn's lost nobility.|[[Brian Sibley]] on the casting of Robert Stephens.}}
